'''3.15.40''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher]] that was released on June 4th, 2025.

== Changes ==
* Removed the glowing animation from the ''[[A Minecraft Movie]]'' button, and as a result is now stationary in other sections of the launcher besides the Movie section.
